name: Adrian Chan
bio: An experienced educator with over five years in international debate experience. Adrian is an ICYD International Finalist (2023), broke Oxford Schools (2025), and 3rd Best Speaker at the Team Canada Fundraiser (2025). He has condensed his debate knowledge into a debate accelerator used by over 100 debaters in Hong Kong, the UK and the US.

name: Gavin Zhao
bio: A nationally ranked Public Forum debater with a strong track record on the US circuit. Gavin competed at Oxford Schools 2025 and co-leads the team’s operations and outreach.

name: Matthew Wong
bio: A competitive debater with four years of BP debating and adjudication experience. Matthew has competed at ICYD and Cambridge Schools, and currently serves as a Debate Society captain at Winchester. He brings over two years of coaching experience and extensive politics, economics and international relations experience.

name: Andre Chan
bio: A seasoned debater with experience in both WSDC and BP formats. Andre contributes to curriculum design and training with his 4+ years of experience.

name: Jayden Su
bio: A leading member of several student-led organizations and charities, Jayden brings extensive administrative and operational experience.

name: Arthur Zhang
bio: A top-performing PF debater: 2nd Place Team and Top Speaker at the 2023 Harvard International PF Tournament (Open Division), with past top finishes in 2022 and 2021. NSDA Global Excellent Debater (2020) and 1st Place at Wincheste College’s Inter-boarding house Debating Competition(Yaw Pot). Arthur brings his wealth of experience to lead our upcoming Public Forum course.

name: Valmik Dangayach
bio: The youngest member of the Team Hong Kong Development Squad with experience in both BP and WSDC formats. He recently won the U17 finals of Oxford WSDC 2025 and was the 13th best speaker in the Hong Kong Debate Open.

name: Eric Jin
bio: A BP debater who recently placed 3rd at the Team Canada Fundraiser 2025. Eric empathatically supports new debaters.

name: Raul Laszlo-Louro
bio: An accomplished BP debater with experience at ICYD and Imperial Schools. Raul has been a finalist in multiple intra-school tournaments and mentors younger debaters.

name: Aaryav Khaderia
bio: A decorated debater as the 4th best speaker in the Hong Kong Junior Schools Debating Championship 2024 and a member of the HKIS debate team.

name: Jade Yoo
bio: A member of the Advanced Debate Team at Phillips Exeter Academy, she has had numerous successes within the DANEIS circuit.

name: Winston Chan
bio: Winston has debate experience from both DBS and Winchester College. He specializes in helping new ESL debaters.

name: Aloysius Yeung
bio: Aloysius supports both coaching and program logistics.

name: Theo Okolo
bio: With a background in entrepreneurship and marketing, Theo drives the team’s outreach strategy and engagement efforts.

name: Vivien Shang
bio: Creates engaging content across social media platforms to achieve our mission of democratizing access to debate through free content.

name: Andy Liu
bio: Works on digital outreach and visual media, helping expand our online presence.

name: Aaditiya Bilakanti
bio: Aaditiya played a critical role in updating our website and is working on exciting AI debate tools.

name: Andrew Chen
bio: Andrew supports the creation debate content as well as interacting with parents.
